command.theatrical.countdown.success: Successfully scheduled a countdown of %d seconds for %d player%s
command.theatrical.director.plot_armor.p: The targeted player cannot store the plot armor type data. This is a bug in the mod and should never be possible, please report what conditions lead to this outcome on the GitHub repository's issues page.
command.theatrical.director.plot_armor.s: Set the plot armor type of %s to %s.
command.theatrical.director.director.pla: The targeted player cannot store the director data. This is a bug in the mod and should never be possible, please report what conditions lead to this outcome on the GitHub repository's issues page.
exception.theatrical.not_director: You are not an operator, or a director!
command.theatrical.countdown.fail1: Failed to get a response from all selected players in the configured amount of time, please try again.
command.theatrical.countdown.fail2: Not all players are ready to start the scene!
